name: Pig Home Defense
description:
It's the story of three little pigs that needs to defend themselves against the big bad Wolf. The pigs need to create offensive or defensive structures in order to counter the big bad Wolf's attacks. At a certain stage of the game, the big bad Wolf blows wind on the level, breaking some of the ressources built and damaging the pigs' house. The pigs are victorious once they reach 3 rounds.

Credits 

Janick Fortin - Programming

Francis Richard-Emond - Programming

Nicholas Gauthier-Regis - Art

Carl Perreault - Tech and Art

Ubisoft
